Package game.items

Class ConsumableItem

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameEntity
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
game.items.ConsumableItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
Printable
Direct Known Subclasses:
FlaskOfHealing, FlaskOfRejuvenation, ShadowTree
public abstract class ConsumableItem extends Item
Abstract class representing an item that can be consumed by an actor.

Consumable items have limited uses and provide certain effects upon consumption. They are defined by the attributes they modify and the values of those modifications.

    • ConsumableItem

      public ConsumableItem(String name, char displayChar, List<BaseActorAttributes> baseEffects, List<Integer> baseEffectValues, List<ActorAttributes> actorEffects, List<Integer> actorEffectValues, int NoOfUse, ItemType itemType)
      Constructor to initialize a consumable item with specific effects, use count, and attributes.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the item
      displayChar - the character to represent the item on the map
      Effect - list of attributes affected by the item
      EffectValue - list of values for the effects on the attributes
      NoOfUse - the number of times the item can be used
